description: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number Doc3779294525 - EF245-231530 dated December 7, 2022 with a closing of December 22, 2022 at 2 PM EST. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the least by 2 PM EST on January 25, 2023. All bids submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. PWGSC, on behalf of Department National Defence , is issuing this REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL for the 1. Acquisition, delivery and installation of 83 Metal Lockers Non-SA for Montréal, Québec, Canada, and for the acquisition and installation of 34 student chairs, and for the acquisition and installation of 6 refrigerators and 10 disinfection units. PWPGSC, on behalf of DoMN, is issuing this RFp for The acquisition and installation of one (1) commercial-grade, stainless steel, motion-sensing freezer. PWGSC, on behalf of DoMN, is issuing this REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) for the acquisition and installation of 170 carts, This RFp is cancel and super cede the RFP of Doc3778179232  dated on December 23, 2022 2022,  with  a closing of  January 9, 2023  2 PM EST of current temporary supply Agreements EQ281859 306 SET HIS/K103 as mentioned of annex a.
full_summary:
================

**Contract Notice**

### Request for Proposal: EF245-231530-2 Metal Lockers Non-SA for DND Montreal

**Reference Number:** WS3777673733-Doc3815731802
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Publication Date:** January 9, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** January 25, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Notice Overview**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), invites bidders to submit proposals for the acquisition, delivery, and installation of 83 Metal Lockers Non-SA for the Montreal region.

**Background**

This solicitation cancels and supersedes the previous solicitation number Doc3779294525 - EF245-231530 dated December 7, 2022, with a closing date of December 22, 2022. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who submitted a bid on the previous solicitation.

**Proposal Details**

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity:** Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Location:** Montreal, Quebec, Canada
* **Number of Metal Lockers:** 83
* **Expected Start Date:** None
* **Expected End Date:** None

**Proposal Criteria**

The selection criteria for this proposal are based on the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements**

This tender is open to proponents who are eligible under the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

**Tender Notice**

More information can be found on the Ariba website:

* English: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15080961?extsite=MTUwODA5NjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* French: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15080961?extsite=MTUwODA5NjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Contact Information**

Julie Carbonneau (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: julie.carbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Deadline**

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2:00 PM EST on January 25, 2023. Any bids submitted after 2
